node.title: Finnish PM sorry for going to nightclub after being exposed to COVID
node.alt: A young female politician wears a black face mask as she speaks into the mics of assembled media.
node.description: After photographs of her night out appear in a Finnish gossip magazine, Sanna Marin admits she "did wrong" but claims she was told she didn't need to quarantine as she had been double-vaccinated.
node.content:
["Finnish Prime Minister Sanna Marin has apologised\u00a0for socialising and dancing in a crowded nightclub after being exposed to COVID-19.", "Ms Marin was exposed to the virus during a meeting last Friday and was told about it while she was out at a restaurant on Saturday evening.", "However,\u00a0she admitted she decided not to go home, and was later seen dancing in a nightclub.", "\"I did wrong. I should have considered the situation more carefully,\" Ms Marin said in a television interview with public broadcaster Yle on Wednesday night.", "Other Finnish ministers\u00a0also\u00a0shrugged off recommendations to avoid close contacts with other people over the weekend after being exposed to the virus, according to several media reports.", "Economic Affairs Minister Mika Lintila attended a floorball (floor hockey) match between Finland and Latvia on Sunday, despite being advised to avoid contact with others, Helsingin Sanomat newspaper reported.", "Defence Minister Antti Kaikkonen went to a dinner party on Saturday while Finance Minister Annika Saarikko and Science and Culture Minister Antti Kurvinen cancelled their attendance at the same event to avoid contacts, another paper reported.", "The Finnish Health Institute recommends avoiding social contact while waiting for COVID test results.", "
PM's office recommended avoiding contact
", "The politicians were exposed on Friday\u00a0at a ministerial meeting attended by Foreign Minister Pekka Haavisto, who tested positive for COVID-19 on Saturday.", "Ms Marin said she was at a restaurant when she received a phone call from her state secretary informing her about the exposure.", "\"He said ministers would not be quarantined because they all have been vaccinated twice,\" Ms Marin wrote on Facebook, explaining why she decided to continue socialising and dancing later at a crowded nightclub.", "The post came after a Finnish gossip magazine published a photo of Ms\u00a0Marin in the club.", "The Prime Minister's office later said it had sent the exposed ministers two text messages on Saturday recommending that they avoid contact with other people.", "Ms Marin said she had left her official phone at home and instead, had relied on her assistants reaching her on her personal phone.", "Ms Marin has since taken two COVID-19 tests that have been negative. Mr Lintila and Mr Kaikkonen have\u00a0also tested negative.", "Finland has seen a surge of new COVID-19 cases in the past months, spurring health officials to worry about the healthcare system being overburdened.", "Several big hospitals around the country have postponed non-critical surgeries and the government on Wednesday proposed a vaccine mandate for healthcare workers.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
", "ABC/Reuters"]
